spatial_accuracy.notes: The 3D render significantly modifies the floor plan. The garage is mirrored to the right side compared to the layout, and the entire master suite/ensuite/WIR cluster has been rearranged. Door placements are largely arbitrary and do not reflect the architectural swings indicated in the 2D document.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are thick but inconsistent. The relationship between the kitchen, pantry, and theatre is lost; the 'Alfresco' area has been enclosed as a standard room rather than an outdoor terrace. The entry/portico area lacks the structural definition of the original plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is generically placed. The kitchen island lacks the sink/appliance placement specified, and the theatre seating is replaced with a standard couch. Furniture scale is inconsistent, particularly in the bedrooms.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render is visually pleasing with clean lighting and a consistent isometric camera angle. Geometry is sharp, though the interpretation of the floor plan is architecturally unfaithful.

detected_errors.description: Garage and entry portico elements are mirrored/misplaced relative to the main living block.
Master Suite and WIR orientation flipped and door access points moved to incorrect walls.
Hallucinated enclosure of the Alfresco area into a four-walled interior room.
Missing specific kitchen pantry structure and recessed wall features in the living area.
Proportions of the 'Study' and 'Activity' rooms are distorted to accommodate misplaced hallway transitions.
